Package orestes.bloomfilter.redis

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BloomFilterRedis<T>
    A persistent bloom filter backed by the Redis key value store.
    CBloomFilterRedis<T>
    Uses regular key-value pairs for counting instead of a bitarray.
    CBloomFilterRedisBits<T>
    This Redis-backed bloomfilter stores the counting bits in a bit array and uses Lua scripting (available in Redis 2.6 and above) to access it efficiently.
    RedisBitSet
    A persistent BitSet backed by Redis.
